channel.title: Rune-evo npc stats
channel.description: :) im currently using the rune-evo source (matrix 718 client) since this specific source dosnt have an autospawn.cfg or the correct npchandlers i cant set an npc to have health or even a max hit, i can spawn the npc through npcspawning.java and they go in the located area but asoon as i attack them they die in 1 hit. Dose any1 know exactly wich file i could change this? thanks :)
